sentences.en: A friend . And the death of this friend would sanctify his crime.
sentences.cn: 而这位朋友的死尊崇着这他的罪行.

sentences.en: And for their sake I sanctify Myself , that they themselves also may be sanctified in truth.
sentences.cn: 19我为他们的缘故,圣别自己, 使他们也在真理中得以圣别.

sentences.en: And for their sakes I sanctify myself, that they also might be sanctified through the truth.
sentences.cn: 我为他们的缘故,自己分别为圣, 叫他们也因真理成圣.

sentences.en: And he poured of the anointing oil upon Aaron's head and anointed him, to sanctify him.
sentences.cn: 12又把膏油倒在亚伦的头上膏他, 使他成圣.

sentences.en: And Jehu said, Sanctify a solemn assembly for Baal. And they proclaimed it.
sentences.cn: 20耶户说, 要为巴力召开严肃会.于是他们宣告召开大会.

sentences.en: And thou shalt anoint the laver and his foot, and sanctify it.
sentences.cn: 要抹洗濯盆和盆座, 使盆成圣.

sentences.en: And you shall anoint the laver and its base, and sanctify it.
sentences.cn: 11要抹洗濯盆和盆座, 使盆分别为圣.

sentences.en: Jn. 17:17 Sanctify them in the truth; Your word is truth.
sentences.cn: 约十七17求你用真理圣别他们, 你的话就是真理.

sentences.en: May God himself, the God of peace, sanctify you through and through.
sentences.cn: 愿赐43平安的神亲自使你们全然成44圣.

sentences.en: Sanctify them in the truth; Your word is truth.
sentences.cn: 约17:17求你用真理使他们成圣. 你的道就是真理.

sentences.en: Sanctify them through thy truth: thy word is truth.
sentences.cn: 17求你用真理使他们成圣.你的道就是真理.

sentences.en: St. Francis wanted to sanctify poverty, not to abolish it.
sentences.cn: 圣弗朗西斯想圣化贫困而不是消除它.

sentences.en: That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word.
sentences.cn: 要用水藉着道,把教会洗净,成为圣洁.

sentences.en: The rule of the Czar was sanctified by the Russian Orthodox Church.
sentences.cn: 沙皇统治是经俄国东正教会认可的。

sentences.en: To make holy by religious rite; sanctify.
sentences.cn: 用宗教仪式使神圣化; 使神圣.

sentences.en: To make the sign of the cross over so as to sanctify.
sentences.cn: 在胸前划十字以示洗清罪孽.
